Name: cookies 小OOkies COOKIES
About the game: cookies COOKIES COOKIES is a 2d runner game made in pixel style about a boy Tonny, a cookie lover, Tonny must score a lot of points to wake up Tony has always been a very happy boy and has always liked to eat cookies, but there were never enough of them. Once Tony falls asleep and he dreams that he is a character who catches cookies and no longer wants to wake up, because this is what Tony always wanted, the 3rd day passed but Tony still did not wake up, the doctors stated that the boy was in a coma. Parents are trying in every possible way to wake up the boy, including his favorite music and bringing fresh and tasty cookies to the ward. At the same time, Tonny cannot pass the level where he needs to reach a certain number of points in order to complete the game, every time he is hindered by evil enemies in the role of crows, ground beetles. Help Tony collect as many cookies as possible, score high points and return to life. Use your skills, you can jump high, dodge and use abilities. Features: Graphics by LenstroyUI Music LenstroyUI
